i just downloaded it, nothing really happend, its like theres a tutorial at the begining involved with the kinect, but i skipped it, my copied games still work so :D just download it if u want :)
it is a kinect and avatar update
TOTAL SHIT! I can't play, says "cant continue with the update" now I will have to take my 360 with tech support...
dont use this on old firmware.kills halo reach/blk ops/and modernwarefare 2

Don't flash anything you find on the net to anything you own!

If you need an update just grab it from M$ site.

you do not need to download this here, you can get it from m$ site as already stated.. I would say thats the safer bet.

As for the Reach/Black-Ops/MW2 problem all you have to do is run the original ISO for each game through abgx again which will create a new dvd file then burn a new disc for each "back-up" with imgburn ;) 

Job done and your back online playing your fave games again.
